name: World Protection for Dogs and Cats in the Meat Trade
goal:
World Protection for Dogs and Cats in the Meat Trade also known as the NoToDogMeat Foundation is a UK charity 1154524 set up to :

PROMOTE HUMANE BEHAVIOUR TOWARDS DOGS AND CATS BY ANY OR ALL OF THE FOLLOWING MEANS:
(1) PREVENTING OR SUPPRESSING CRUELTY TO ANIMALS IN THE DOG AND CAT MEAT TRADE WORLDWIDE;
(2) PROVIDING SUPPORT TO ANIMAL SANCTUARIES WHO RESCUE DOGS AND CATS FROM THE MEAT TRADE;
(3) FACILITATING THE PROVISION OF VETERINARY CARE AND TREATMENT FOR DOGS AND CATS IN THE MEAT TRADE INCLUDING THOSE AT DOG FARMS AND ANIMALS WHICH HAVE BEEN RESCUED;
(4) ASSISTING WITH REHOMING OF DOGS AND CATS (INCLUDING LOST PETS) WHO HAVE BEEN RESCUED FROM THE DOG AND CAT MEAT MARKETS AND TRADE;
(5) CAMPAIGNING FOR ANIMAL WELFARE LAWS TO BE RESPECTED AND ENFORCED BOTH ON AN INTERNATIONAL AND NATIONAL LEVEL FOR ANIMALS IN THE DOG AND CAT MEAT TRADE AT ALL LEVELS INCLUDING DOG FARMS, LIVE TRANSPORT OF DOGS AND CATS FOR SLAUGHTER, ACTION ON BREACH OF SLAUGHTER HOUSE REGULATIONS/ CLOSURE OF ILLEGAL SLAUGHTERHOUSES AND/ OR SUPPRESSION OF BOILING /SKINNING AND BLOWTORCHING LIVE DOGS AND CATS IN THE MEAT MARKETS.
interests: Education, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Trade
euInitiatives: Promotion of Humane Behaviour towards dogs and cats used for food and fur.
